Vertical profile (vp) example

Source: R/data.R
example_vp.Rd

Example of a vp object with name example_vp.

Usage

example_vp

Format

An object of class vp with 25 rows and 16 columns.

Value

An example object of type vp which represents a vertical profile.

See also

  • summary.vp()

Examples

# Reload example_vp from package (e.g. in case it was altered)
data(example_vp)

# Get summary info
example_vp
#>                Vertical profile (class vp)
#> 
#>        radar:  seang 
#>       source:  WMO:02606,RAD:SE50,PLC:Ängelholm,NOD:seang,ORG:82,CTY:643,CMT:Swedish radar 
#> nominal time:  2015-10-18 18:00:00 
#> generated by:  vol2bird 0.3.17
